Packages that use PixelIterator.Builder
Package
Description
org.apache.sis.image
Provides helper classes for handling Java2D rendered images together with some operations.

    Method
    Description
    PixelIterator.Builder
    PixelIterator.Builder.setIteratorOrder(SequenceType order)
    Sets the desired iteration order.
    PixelIterator.Builder
    PixelIterator.Builder.setRegionOfInterest(Rectangle subArea)
    Sets the region (in pixel coordinates) where to perform the iteration.

    Sets the size of the window to use in PixelIterator.createWindow(TransferType) method.
